columns.name: Name
columns.description: The carrier company name. Uniquely identifies the carrier in this table.

columns.name: Carrier Type
columns.description: Type of carrier based on their main mode of transport: either 'Land Carrier' for trucks and other ground vehicles, or 'Ocean Carrier' for sea freight.

columns.name: Method Code
columns.description: Mode of transportation used by the carrier: 'Ground' or 'Ocean'.

columns.name: Has Transactions
columns.description: Indicates if this carrier has been used for at least one shipment. Either 'Yes' or 'No'.

columns.name: Creation Date
columns.description: Date when this carrier record was created in the system.

columns.name: Country
columns.description: Country where the port is located.

columns.name: Subdivision
columns.description: State, province, or subdivision of the port location.

columns.name: Air
columns.description: Whether the port supports air transportation (true/false).

columns.name: Ocean
columns.description: Whether the port supports ocean shipping (true/false).

columns.name: Rail
columns.description: Whether the port supports rail transportation (true/false).

columns.name: Road
columns.description: Whether the port supports road transportation (true/false).

columns.name: Mail
columns.description: Whether the port handles mail services (true/false).
